content: https://github.com/zulip/zulip/issues/3903 I have the same issue in my production env. I need to change the db. I cant update the zulip server at the moment. Please help me to do this. Im using in zulip in a Ubuntu 16.04.2 LTS.

@Chamath Sandaru Can you explain specifically the issue you're having?

The linked issue looks like it was fixed in Zulip 1.6, which was released last summer. What version of Zulip are you running?
(The current version is 1.7.1 -- that's what you have if you installed recently from the standard instructions.)
